actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of the Shippensburg Public Library, the Osterhout Library, the West Pittston Library, the West Shore Public Library, the Milton Public Library, and the Himmelreich Library.

summary.text: Relieves specified libraries in Pennsylvania from liability for erroneous U.S. contributions for disaster relief activities.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of the Shippensburg Public Library, the Osterhout Library, the West Pittston Library, the West Shore Public Library, the Milton Public Library, and the Himmelreich Library.
